title: Add “votingprinciples” text record to Opium protocol ENS domain
body:
Add “votingprinciples” text record to ENS domain “opiumprotocol.eth” with content “ipfs://QmXRK6Egnnd2dMGZV3WCL1H7z3YVJjGgt8pQBmdeurzt38”

The principles (v1.0.0):
IPFS link: https://cloudflare-ipfs.com/ipfs/QmXRK6Egnnd2dMGZV3WCL1H7z3YVJjGgt8pQBmdeurzt38

Primary discussion:
https://forum.opium.network/t/discussion-community-voting-principles/257/5
author: 0x94Aff6c2c005567aa0e2a27F77701Bb1B6679B6b
